alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Twin Falls County through 545 PM MDT... At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hollister, or 15 miles south of Twin Falls, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Magic Valley Regional Airport around 530 PM MDT. Twin Falls, Kimberly and Rock Creek around 540 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
